QuestData.Title: Encroaching Poachers
QuestData.Description:
The Wastewanders used the pelts of the local hyenas to construct our armor. Unfortunately since the Amathet arrived, their hunters have overrun our normal hunting grounds.
We need those pelts, and will pay handsomely for them. Either take them from the hunters or skin the hyenas yourself, if you have the skill.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Rugged Hyena Pelts from Amathet Hunters or by skinning hyenas in Uldum.
